title: Ukraine slams Moscow's offer to evacuate civilians to Russia and Belarus as 'immoral' - CNN
content: Ukraine slams Moscow's offer to evacuate civilians to Russia and Belarus as 'immoral'  CNNView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ordinary Ukrainians living in some areas under attack by Russian forces faced a cynical proposal on Monday: stay put and risk getting bombed, or leave home and head for Russia or Belarus.
